level.text: This chapter shall govern the issuance of certificates of public convenience and necessity under the Public Utilities Amendment Act of 1989.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is Paragraph 2(B) of §8 of An Act Making appropriation to provide for the expenses of the District of Columbia for the fiscal year ending June thirtieth, nineteen hundred and fourteen, and for other purposes, approved March 4, 1913 (37 Stat. 977; D.C. Code §43-501); as amended by §2(d) of the Public Utilities Amendment Act of 1989, D.C. Law 8-47, D.C. Code §43-501 (1990 Repl. Vol.).
